statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution
SELECT id, dispute_description FROM conflict_resolution
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, dispute_description FROM conflict_resolution WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, resolution_deadline FROM conflict_resolution ORDER BY resolution_deadline ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, dispute_description, resolution_deadline FROM conflict_resolution;
SELECT timestamp, dispute_description FROM conflict_resolution WHERE resolution_deadline > NOW();
SELECT dispute_description, resolution_deadline FROM conflict_resolution WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, dispute_description FROM conflict_resolution WHERE resolution_deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline;
SELECT id, dispute_id, resolution_deadline FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT timeline_id, task_description FROM ConflictResolutionTask WHERE timeline_id = 5;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_deadline FROM ConflictResolutionTask ORDER BY task_deadline ASC;
SELECT resolution_deadline, dispute_id FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline WHERE dispute_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline WHERE dispute_id = 10;
SELECT timeline_id, task_description FROM ConflictResolutionTask WHERE task_deadline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT dispute_id, resolution_deadline FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline ORDER BY resolution_deadline DESC, dispute_id ASC;
SELECT dispute_id, resolution_deadline FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline WHERE resolution_deadline >= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY dispute_id;

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, tt.resolution_deadline FROM ConflictResolutionTask t JOIN ConflictResolutionTimeline tt ON t.timeline_id = tt.id ORDER BY tt.resolution_deadline ASC, t.task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Timeline;
SELECT timeline_name, start_date, end_date FROM Timeline;
SELECT deadline_name, due_date FROM Deadlines;
SELECT dispute_description, parties_involved, resolution_date FROM Disputes;
SELECT timeline_id, timeline_name, start_date, end_date, resolution_status FROM Timeline;
SELECT * FROM Timeline;
SELECT timeline_name, start_date FROM Timeline WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, parties_involved FROM Disputes WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT deadline_name, due_date FROM Deadlines ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT timeline_id, timeline_name, start_date, end_date FROM Timeline WHERE resolution_status = True;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_timeline;
SELECT event_name, start_date, end_date FROM conflict_resolution_timeline WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resolution_date, result FROM resolution_history ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT party_id, party_name FROM dispute_parties WHERE party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM dispute_deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, start_date, end_date FROM conflict_resolution_timeline WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM dispute_parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT case_id, MAX(deadline_date) AS latest_deadline FROM dispute_deadlines GROUP BY case_id ORDER BY latest_deadline DESC;
SELECT party_name, resolution_date, result FROM dispute_parties JOIN resolution_history ON dispute_parties.case_id = resolution_history.case_id ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;

SELECT party_name, party_role, event_name, start_date, end_date FROM dispute_parties JOIN conflict_resolution_timeline ON dispute_parties.case_id = conflict_resolution_timeline.id WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConflictTimeline;
SELECT description, start_date FROM ConflictTimeline WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM DeadlineManagement ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM TimelineEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parties_involved, resolution_status FROM DisputeResolution WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM ConflictTimeline ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT id, description, start_date, end_date FROM ConflictTimeline WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, description, start_date, end_date FROM ConflictTimeline WHERE description LIKE '%conflict%'
SELECT end_date, start_date, description FROM ConflictTimeline ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date ASC
SELECT id, start_date, end_date FROM ConflictTimeline WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' OR end_date > '2022-12-31'
